amendment.description: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for automatic continuing resolutions.
amendment.purpose: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for automatic continuing resolutions.

action.text: Amendment SA 7 proposed by Senator Portman.
Motion to table amendment SA 7 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 7.
